name: Democracy Earth
headline: Censorship resistant democracies.
description:
Our mission is to build a sustainable democracy for the Information Age. We create censorship resistant, free and open source software that can deploy democracies anywhere there's an internet connection. We have implemented governance infrastructure for crypto networks; shadow referendums for activists in critical countries and the first Quadratic Voting implementation in the USA for the Colorado Legislative House.

Backed by Templeton Foundation (2019), Y Combinator (2015) and Fast Forward (2016). Presented on TED Global (2014). Awarded by MIT Technology Review (2017) and Singularity University (2016). We did research for Alphabet, World Economic Forum and the University of Berkeley.

## Proof of Humanity.
Decentralized human identity.Built for [Ethereum](http://democracy.earth/<https:/ethereum.org>) blockchains.[](http://democracy.earth/<http:/opensource.org/>)
[![](https://uploads-ssl.webflow.com/560623e12dfa900754227b1c/63ab1a62b595444cd2725d41_Screen-Shot-2022-11-24-at-10.56.21-PM.png)](http://democracy.earth/<https:/proofofhumanity.org>)
![](https://uploads-ssl.webflow.com/560623e12dfa900754227b1c/618d4aa277ecea29486ebb59_noun_King_4058529.svg)
#### Self Sovereign.
No servers or databases are used. Control your identity with any Ethereum wallet.
![](https://uploads-ssl.webflow.com/560623e12dfa900754227b1c/618d4b1589c4362c4c7ab7e0_noun_no%20biometric_2411132.svg)
#### Privacy Preserving.
No biometrics or real names are required.Just a quick video that proves your humanity.
![](https://uploads-ssl.webflow.com/560623e12dfa900754227b1c/618d4b78ed18076b789e1751_noun_Audit_3147203.svg)
#### Perpetually Verifiable.
Audit any profile without permission.Open source and democratic.

## Eradicating poverty via decentralization 💧
UBI is a Universal Basic Income token that gets streamed using Ethereum to verified Proof of Humanity profiles.From a grandparent in Buenos Aires to young children in Mumbai: everyone gets the same amount.

## Humanitarian Vaults
Contribute to the success of UBI and Proof of Humanity by leveraging ETH.Keep ETH or DAI in our smart contract vaults and help burn UBI tokens using yield.
[![](https://uploads-ssl.webflow.com/560623e12dfa900754227b1c/618d4427adb742c9dff7df8a_Screen%20Shot%202021-11-11%20at%205.26.07%20PM.png)](http://democracy.earth/<http:/app.democracy.earth>)
![](https://uploads-ssl.webflow.com/560623e12dfa900754227b1c/618d4a5a903ea1d7b9c944e6_noun_chart_963813.png)
#### Keep exposure to crypto.
Staked crypto is kept on a digital vault.You'll get equivalent ubiETH or ubiDAI tokens.
![](https://uploads-ssl.webflow.com/560623e12dfa900754227b1c/618d49caa8c3db072891d471_noun_Interest_1947540.png)
#### Earn ~5% APY Interest.
ETH or DAI is lended via [Yearn Finance](http://democracy.earth/<https:/yearn.finance>). Earn the cumulative interest.
![](https://uploads-ssl.webflow.com/560623e12dfa900754227b1c/618d4a2351453fd50f0ac45c_noun_Fire_3723225.png)
#### Burn [🔥](http://democracy.earth/<https:/emojipedia.org/fire/>) UBI with yield.
Half the yield is used to buy UBI.UBI is then burned, reducing its supply.
[![](https://uploads-ssl.webflow.com/560623e12dfa900754227b1c/5ad76c220cebffbd9a6497a3_noun_1568317_ffffff.png)VAULTS](http://democracy.earth/<http:/app.democracy.earth>)
[![](https://uploads-ssl.webflow.com/560623e12dfa900754227b1c/618d4964f0583f23173bb12e_pngfind.com-twitter-png-logo-530160.png)chat](http://democracy.earth/<https:/t.me/democracyearth>)
[![](https://uploads-ssl.webflow.com/560623e12dfa900754227b1c/58ebac52b543ae4fe765906f_twitter-512.gif)social](http://democracy.earth/<https:/twitter.com/democracyearth>)

The Social Smart Contract (2017) and our peer reviewed Who Watches the Watchmen (2020) paper describe our vision for democracy.

### Democracy Earth Overview

**Founding Year:** 2015  
**Location:** Madrid, Spain  
**Team Size:** 2 employees  
**Support:** Backed by the Templeton Foundation (2019), Y Combinator (2015), and Fast Forward (2016)  
**Website:** [democracy.earth](http://democracy.earth/)  

#### Mission
Democracy Earth is on a mission to create censorship-resistant democracies, essentially building a sustainable framework for democracy that thrives in the Information Age. Their focus is on developing free and open-source software capable of deploying democratic structures wherever there is internet access.

#### Achievements
Initially, the organization implemented governance infrastructures for crypto networks, conducted shadow referendums for activists in critical regions, and introduced the first Quadratic Voting in Colorado’s Legislative House. They have garnered attention on prestigious platforms like TED Global (2014) and received accolades from MIT Technology Review (2017) and Singularity University (2016). Their research contributions have been recognized by Alphabet and the World Economic Forum, among others.

#### Current Projects
1. **Proof of Humanity (PoH):** A decentralized identity verification system built on the Ethereum blockchain, aimed at creating a verifiable digital identity for individuals without relying on biometrics or real names.
  
2. **Universal Basic Income (UBI):** A project that streams universal basic income via Ethereum to verified Proof of Humanity accounts, promoting financial equality across the globe.

3. **Humanitarian Vaults:** A financial tool designed to help users leverage their cryptocurrency holdings to support the UBI initiative while also facilitating the burning of UBI tokens to manage supply.

4. **Community Engagement:** Democracy Earth is actively seeking to expand its reach by inviting individuals to join their efforts as team members or by starting local chapters to empower citizens worldwide.

#### Future Aspirations
The overarching goal is to establish a global commons and ensure that no individual is left behind in their pursuit of democratic freedoms and rights. Democracy Earth aims to use cutting-edge technology not just as a tool for governance, but as a means to redefine what democracy can look like in a digital age. 

If you're interested in participating or learning more, you can check out their early access options on their website. In a world where voices often get drowned out, Democracy Earth is a beacon for those who believe in a collective, empowered future.
